  • Uses of ApiVersionDeprecationHandler in org.springframework.web.reactive.accept

    Classes in org.springframework.web.reactive.accept that implement ApiVersionDeprecationHandler
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    StandardApiVersionDeprecationHandler
    ApiVersionDeprecationHandler based on RFC 9745 and RFC 8594 that provides the option to set the "Deprecation" and "Sunset" response headers, as well as to add "Link" headers with further details about both.

    Method
    Description
    ApiVersionConfigurer
    ApiVersionConfigurer.setDeprecationHandler(ApiVersionDeprecationHandler handler)
